description:
Rundelhaus Code is one of the People of the Land who tried to become an Adventurer, despite not having the ability to be resurrected upon death like the players from the real world. He is a Sorcerer specialized in offensive magic. After being mortally wounded, he signs a contract with Shiroe (who uses a new type of magic invented by him) to save his life and earn the secondary class "Adventurer". He joins Log Horizon with Isuzu.
Source: Wiki
name: Rundelhaus Code
